projects.title: Unified Campus Experience Platform
projects.problem: Students waste 25–30 minutes daily navigating fragmented academic portals.
projects.solution: Designed a centralized dashboard integrating SSO, Unified Notifications, and a Central Task Timeline.
projects.impact: Goal: Reduce daily navigation time by 60–65%
